Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Entity2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.Entity2DContainer
      • com.xebisco.yield.Entity2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Renderable
    public final class Entity2D
extends Entity2DContainer
implements Renderable, Disposable
    The Entity2D class is a final class that extends Entity2DContainer and implements Renderable and Disposable, and contains various methods and properties for managing components and rendering.

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible​(boolean visible)
        This function sets the visibility of this entity.
        Parameters:
        visible - The "visible" parameter is a boolean variable that determines whether this entity should be visible or not. If the value of "visible" is true, the object will be visible on the screen. If the value is false, the object or component will be hidden from view.
